name: Rawon
description: A simple powerful Discord music bot built to fulfill your production desires. Easy to use, with no coding required.

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: What is your Discord bot's token? | Example: NTE5NjQ2MjIxNTU2Nzc2OTcw.XAcEQQ.0gjhNbGeWBsKP6FVuIyZWlG2cMd

MAIN_PREFIX.description: What should be the main prefix of your bot? | Example: !

ALT_PREFIX.description: What should be the alternative prefixes of your bot? | Example: "?, {mention}" | Formats: {mention} = @bot mention

EMBED_COLOR.description: What should be your bot's embed color code? (hex) | Example: 22C9FF

LOCALE.description: What should be the language of your bot? | Example: en | Available: en, es, id

ACTIVITIES.description: Activity list, what text should be appear on your bot's status? | Example: "Hello world!, My prefix is {prefix}" | Formats: {prefix} = bot prefix, {userCount} = user amount, {textChannelsCount} = text channel amount, {serverCount} = server amount, {playingCount} = amount of server playing music using the bot, {username} = bot username
ACTIVITIES.value: My default prefix is {prefix}, music with {userCount} users, {textChannelsCount} text channels in {serverCount} guilds, 'Hello there, my name is {username}'

ACTIVITY_TYPES.description: Activity type list. The order of this value is the same as ACTIVITIES. For example, first value of ACTIVITIES will use first value of this. | Example: "PLAYING, COMPETING" | Available: PLAYING, WATCHING, LISTENING, COMPETING

STREAM_STRATEGY.description: Which youtube downloader do you want to use? But if you use play-dl, it will support a few sites. | Example: play-dl | Available: play-dl, yt-dlp

ENABLE_SLASH_COMMAND.description: Do you want to enable slash command support? | Example: yes

MUSIC_SELECTION_TYPE.description: Which music selection type do you want to use? | Example: selectmenu | Available: message (just like in the previous version), selectmenu (uses discord selection menu)

ENABLE_24_7_COMMAND.description: Do you want to enable the 24/7 command? | Example: no

STAY_IN_VC_AFTER_FINISHED.description: Do you want to make your bot not leaving the voice channel after playing a song? | Example: no

YES_EMOJI.description: What should be your bot's emoji for every success sentence? | Example: ✅

NO_EMOJI.description: What should be your bot's emoji for every failed sentence? | Example: ❌
